step_feedback.feedback: Good job tightening your fists and muscles while bringing your arms in. Keep up the controlled movement.
Excellent work opening your fingers and extending your arms horizontally. Ensure you're fully relaxing your muscles as you exhale.
Great execution of the outward arm movement and muscle relaxation. Remember to breathe out fully.
Well done on maintaining shoulder height and relaxing. Focus on a smooth, controlled extension.
Good job completing the exercise. Ensure your wrists are relaxed and fingers spread wide on the outward movement.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to fully tighten your muscles and make fists when bringing your arms in, then relax and spread your fingers as you extend them out. Keep up the good work!
